title: RHOBH: A Christmas Supper + RIP RHOD & RHONY
itunes:title: RHOBH: A Christmas Supper + RIP RHOD & RHONY
itunes:subtitle: Danny starts the show with another film idea courtesy of his middle school notebook, then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured a Christmas dinner, a Teddi appearance, and Sister Dorit leading the table in pra...
description:
Danny starts the show with another film idea courtesy of his middle school notebook, then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured a Christmas dinner, a Teddi appearance, and Sister Dorit leading the table in prayer. We also touch on the RHOD cancellation news, and yet another week of RHONY.


RHOBH Recap: 10:00ish

RHONY: 43:30ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
